On 2/14/07, Jerome Louvel <contact@...> wrote:
>
>  Let's not waste this opportunity to properly standardize REST on Java.

Does the Expert Group include anyone who has written such an API
already? For example, Jetty has had something similar for years.

Also, you are standardizing a server-side HTTP API, not REST. From
what I have seen so far, it looks like something I would use, but
please rename it.

-- 

Robert Sayre
<http://blog.mozilla.com/rob-sayre/>
"I would have written a shorter letter, but I did not have the time."
